fullText:
Life Thief

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Revenant, rogue
Benefit: When you deal necrotic damage with your dark reaping racial power with an attack that also deals Sneak Attack damage, you can reroll each Sneak Attack damage die that shows a result of 1 or 2. Reroll until a given die has a result greater than 2.

Published in Dragon Magazine 376, page(s) 41.
name: Life Thief
